text: Afshin Hajipour (17 December 1975) is a retired Iranian football midfielder who played for Foolad Ahwaz, Esteghlal Tehran and Sepahan Isfahan. ==References== * Category:1975 births Category:Iranian footballers Category:Foolad FC players Category:Esteghlal F.C. players Category:Sepahan players Category:Living people Category:Association football midfielders Category:People from Khuzestan Province Category:Iran international footballers
title: Afshin Hajipour
